doc.previous: In 1485 Columbus presented his plans to King John II of Portugal He proposed that the king equip three sturdy ships and grant Columbus one year s time to sail out into the Atlantic search for a western route to the Orient and return
doc.after: Columbus also requested he be made Great Admiral of the Ocean appointed governor of any and all lands he discovered and given one tenth of all revenue from those lands
